data.lvlMain_help: Tap on top to enter photo mode, Tap on bottom to get your feed
data.lvlFeed_help: Tap on top to get previous photo, Tap on bottom to get next photo. Swipe right to know more, swipe left to go back.
data.lvlComment_help: Bla bla bla.Swipe right to share the photo outside, Swipe left to go back.
data.lvlPhoto_help: Tap to snap a photo. swipe left to go back.
